data.meta_description: The online application process for Gauhati University PG Admission 2024 has commenced. Students can now apply online for the GU PG Entrance Test.
data.text:
GUPGET Merit List 2024

Candidates who have submitted their online applications for admission into postgraduate courses at Gauhati University and appeared in the GUPGET can download their provisional merit list from the official website. For the convenience of our users, we have provided the direct link to the GUPGET Merit List below.

Important Links of GUPGET Admit Card

Gauhati University PG Admission

Gauhati University is a well-known higher education institution in Assam. Every year, Gauhati University conducts the Post Graduate Entrance Test (PGET) to select meritorious students for admission to various postgraduate courses. For this year, the official notification regarding the GU PGET 2024 was released on 15th June 2024. According to the notification, the Post Graduate Entrance Test (PGET)-2024 will be conducted in 10 centres across the North Eastern states for admission to postgraduate courses under Gauhati University and its affiliated colleges for the academic year 2024-2025.

Related: Dibrugarh University PG Admission

Gauhati University PG Admission Details

Name of Test: Gauhati University Post Graduate Entrance Test, 2024

Name of Courses: MA, MSc and MCom

Academic Year: 2024-2025

Name of University: Gauhati University

Date of Entrance Test: 9th to 11th July 2024

Helplines: 7636890406, 7636890407, 7636891204, 7636890402 and [email protected].

Eligibility Criteria of GU PG Admission

Students who have graduated with a minimum of 24 credits in the specific subject they wish to pursue for their PG, either with a Major/Honours or with a Regular Course, are eligible to submit online applications for the Post Graduate Entrance Test (PGET) of Gauhati University. For more specific details about the eligibility criteria, click here.

Candidates who appeared or are appearing in the 6th Semester BA/BSc/BCom/BVoc Examinations, 2024 and are waiting for their results are eligible to appear in the PGET-2024 and obtain provisional admission if selected. However, candidates must submit their Final Gradesheet/Marksheet within 7 days of the result being declared. Failure to do so will result in the withdrawal of their seat.

Candidates who appeared or are appearing in the 6th Semester BA/BSc/BCom/BVoc Examinations, 2024 and are waiting for their results, but have backlogs in earlier semesters, are also eligible to appear in the PGET-2024 and obtain provisional admission if selected. However, candidates must submit their Final Gradesheet/Marksheet within 7 days of the result being declared. Failure to do so will result in the withdrawal of their seat.

Other Details of GU PG Admission

Application Fee: If an applicant applies for one PG program, the application fee will be Rs.1000/-. For two programs, the application fee will be Rs.1500/-, and for three PG programs, the application fee will be Rs.2000/-. Application fees can only be paid online using a debit card, credit card, or internet banking. The link to the payment gateway will be provided in the online application portal.

Available Disciplines: Gauhati University is one of the oldest universities in Assam and offers a wide range of postgraduate courses in various disciplines. We suggest you click here to learn more about the available disciplines.

How to Apply for GU PG Admission?

Students eligible for the Post Graduate Entrance Test of Gauhati University can submit their applications through the official web portal, known as the OnlineGU portal. You can follow these steps as a reference to complete the online application procedure.

Important Dates of Gauhati University PG Admission

Important Links of GU PG Admission

GU PG Seat Intake Capacity

The seat intake capacity for PG Admission at Gauhati University is as follows. Note that the provided intake capacity is specific to the university campus.

Traditional Programmes

Interdisciplinary Programmes

Note: All starred (*) intake capacities are only available at affiliated colleges.

Schedule of GU PG Entrance Test

As per the official notification, Gauhati University will conduct the Post Graduate Entrance Test (PGET) 2024 from 9th to 11th July 2024. The schedule of GU PGET is as follows.

Name of Exam: PG Entrance Test, 2024

Mode of Exam: Offline

Type of Questions: Multiple Choice Questions (MCQs)

No of Questions: 100 MCQs

Negative Marking: For each wrong answer, a 0.25 mark will be deducted.

Date of Exam: 9th to 11th July 2024

Duration of Exam: 2 Hours.

An applicant can appear in the Gauhati University Post Graduate Entrance Test (PGET-2024) in a maximum of 3 (three) subjects. They can choose only one subject from Traditional Programmes and two subjects from Interdisciplinary Programmes. Additionally, candidates should not apply for more than one subject from the same session on the same date as mentioned in the schedule for entrance tests.

List of PGET-2024 Centres

The Post Graduate Entrance Test (PGET) 2024 of Gauhati University will be held in the following examination centres.
